categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Spartzen was a CR90 Corvette employed by the Rebels as part of an assault force attacking an Imperial Frigate Laantis while it was receiving a new Hyperdrive engine from the freighter Rasvin. The corvette, along with the rest of the Rebels was destroyed in the battle.
Spartzen, along with the Glaser and the Chiller and a number of Y-wings that escort the corvettes are purple in the CMD. However, there is no indication of who they belong to other then the Rebels.
